name: the librarians don't really mind that your library books are overdue
name_original: the librarians don't really mind that your library books are overdue
description:
a game about shame and library books, made for the 'overdue library books' bitsy jam. 

this game is not perfect but it is finished! and I am proud of that. 

also if my employers ask this is not an endorsement of returning your books back late.
